biography: Born and raised in Florence, Italy, Giorgio was the only child born to Rimazio and La Tina Cantarini. Soon after Giorgio, whose family nickname is Gio, celebrated his 5th birthday, his parents were separated and thereafter divorced. He presently resides with his father in Florence while his mother lives in Los Angeles
name: Giorgio Cantarini

cast.title: Il giorno, la notte. Poi l'alba
